entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:49 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:49 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
